title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: The 'All types' dialog is showing obfuscated classes in the list of available classes.
EB: The 'All types' dialog should not display obfuscated classes in the list of available classes.
SR:
To resolve this issue, the following steps can be taken: 
 a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter. 
 b) Completely filter out the obfuscated classes. I suggest implementing option a).
